record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name=NULL and term="Attach command panel" and format.name="attach" and syslanguage="en"
record.format.name: attach

brief.brief: The Attach command panel starts a program as a subtask.
For example, this panel starts Service Manager's scheduler.

detail.detail: Program to Attach: (character) Specify the program to start.
Attached Resource: (character) Specify the name assigned to this task. The signal panel can use this name to terminate the task.
Parameters: (array of characters) Specify the parameters to pass to the program, if any.
Wait for Completion: (Boolean) Specify whether to complete the task before returning control.
This form is for advanced users doing specialized tasks.
If you answer true, your program stops until the attached task is complete.
You can send messages to attached tasks using the msg panel.
The login application attaches all user processes with attached resources set to the user's login name.
